input_parameters.name: time_range
input_parameters.description: The time range for the Rabi experiment.

input_parameters.name: shots
input_parameters.description: The number of shots for each point.

output_parameters.name: rabi_amplitude
output_parameters.description: The amplitude of the Rabi oscillation.

output_parameters.name: rabi_frequency
output_parameters.description: The frequency of the Rabi oscillation.
